issue.title: Search-replace old code snippets with new syntax
issue.body:
As we have a fairly large volume of old issues/discussions, I am wary that some of the syntax is now out of date. Most notably, `eval` is now `seval`. And various kwargs are out-of-date.

I think as part of the 1.0 milestone, we should update the solutions in issues/discussions for the new syntax.
